resources.string: Set a password for your Ethereum wallet. If forgotten it cannot be recovered. A new account can be created at any time, rendering this account inactive. Inactive accounts can be reactivated from the settings.

Searching the blockchain for transactions is time consuming. We search from the current block back in time until either a page of transactions are found or a threshold number of blocks searched is reached. This means there could be gaps between transactions shown where transactions have occurred but are not shown.
Enter a number between 0 and the current block height
Your transaction will appear on the Ethereum network soon and the recipient will receive their funds

There are various reasons your transaction was not submitted successfully. The password could be incorrect. The recipient address may be incorrect. The amount may be more than available. We may not be connected to the Ethereum network.
This action cannot be undone. Any Ether in this wallet will be lost. To delete this address, enter its password:
